location_short_descr: One of the smallest bars in the world - a true hidden gem!
location_long_descr: This unique bar offers cocktails to go with the feeling of a speakeasy, even the bartenders wear masks. If you manage to snag a reservation, a truly one-of-a-time personalized experience awaits you!
details: Ripa di Porta Ticinese, 43, 20143 Milano MI, Italy
Bus or tram to Via Vigevano V.le Gorizia station, then short walk
